content.query:
COPY INTO SalesCopyCommand
(StoreCode 1, Date 2, TotalSales 3, TotalAmount 4)
FROM 'https://adlsfilestest.dfs.core.windows.net/sales/dailysales/*.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sp=rcwd&st=2023-01-09T00:57:04Z&se=2023-01-09T08:57:04Z&sip=163.116.224.115&sv=2021-06-08&sr=c&sig=OkweZjMKV4GXbvtbxqJtJnLQ04mtx3d1pKeK31TwvWY%3D'),
    ENCODING = 'UTF8',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    FIRSTROW=2
)
